entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:45 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
